TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TE: Discover What Our Users Are Saying
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Real experiences from people who've found their perfect products
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This app has completely revolutionized my shopping experience. I've discovered so many unique products I never knew existed!
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: As a busy professional, this app saves me time and introduces me to innovative products that enhance my daily life.
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: I love how personalized the product recommendations are. It's like having a personal shopper in my pocket!
STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_SUBTITLE: Explore a world of innovative and exciting new items tailored to your interests
CONTACT_FORM_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: We'd love to hear from you! Let us know how we can help you find amazing new products.
CONTACT_FORM_TEXT_FIELD_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Tell us about your product preferences

CTA_BODY: Explore a world of innovative and exciting new products tailored to your interests and needs. Our app makes finding your next must-have item effortless and fun.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: How does the product discovery app work?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our app uses advanced algorithms and user preferences to recommend new and exciting products tailored to your interests. Simply create a profile, browse categories, and let our app do the rest!
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: Are the products on the app available for purchase?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: Yes! Most products featured on our app are available for purchase. We provide direct links to trusted retailers where you can buy the items you discover.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: How often are new products added to the app?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: We update our product database daily to ensure you always have access to the latest and most innovative items. Our team of curators constantly searches for unique and trending products to keep your feed fresh and exciting.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Can I save or share products I like?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Absolutely! You can save products to your favorites list for easy access later. You can also share interesting finds with friends and family via social media or direct messaging, right from within the app.
NEWSLETTER_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Discover the Latest and Greatest Products
HERO_SUBTITLE: Uncover trending products and stay ahead of the curve with our cutting-edge discovery platform
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Everything you need to know about discovering amazing new products
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app uses advanced algorithms and user preferences to curate a personalized feed of innovative products from around the world. Simply swipe, save, and explore!
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: Is the app free to use?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Yes, the basic version of our app is completely free. We also offer a premium subscription with additional features for avid product enthusiasts.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: Can I purchase products directly through the app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: While we don't handle transactions directly, we provide links to trusted retailers where you can purchase the products you discover. We're your guide to finding great products, not a marketplace.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: How often are new products added?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: We update our product database daily, ensuring you always have access to the latest and most innovative items across various categories.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Can I share product discoveries with friends?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Absolutely! Our app includes easy sharing features, allowing you to send your favorite finds to friends via social media, messaging apps, or email.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_SECONDARY_TITLE: Explore, Compare, and Find Innovative Items You'll Love
FEATURE_1_BODY: Stay ahead of the curve with our curated selection of the latest and most popular products across various categories.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Get tailored product suggestions based on your preferences, browsing history, and purchase behavior.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Make informed decisions with authentic user feedback and ratings for each product.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Find the best deals by comparing prices from multiple retailers and online marketplaces.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Create wishlists of products you love and easily share them with friends and family.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Stay updated with instant notifications when new products matching your interests become available.

LANDING_PAGE_HERO_TEXT: Your Gateway to Innovation and Trends
